title: Easy To Grow Weed, Hard To Grow Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Special Flower Friday edition with Danny Murr-Sloat, owner of AlpinStash, a revered craft grower and cannabis breeder in Colorado. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss best practices for growing high-quality flower and whether large scale grows can achieve that quality. We also cover the regulatory picture in Colorado and the States, similarities between craft beer and cannabis and why the future of cannabis retail just might involve pinball machines. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
